name: rfpylab
short_description:
This project is intended to create a "playground" for doing work in the RF field of work.

The ultimate goal of this project is to create an environment to easily pull in and manage data, create and analyze circuits, create data processing automation, and even work with fabrication files such as gerber, gds, and dxf files. 

I work as an RF Engineer and have used tools such as ADS, AWR, Matlab, and Python to solve and analyze problems and all of the data processing and manipulation that entails. Ultimately only one of them is free, and it also happens to be the most flexible!
summary: Python based environment for RF engineering
